## Reading in the file, and getitng a Summary

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyverse)



sampleData <- read.csv("https://gist.githubusercontent.com/kevin336/acbb2271e66c10a5b73aacf82ca82784/raw/e38afe62e088394d61ed30884dd50a6826eee0a8/employees.csv")

summary(sampleData)
```

## Making the graph

```{r cars}
plot(sampleData$DEPARTMENT_ID,
      sampleData$SALARY,
      xlab="Department as classified by Department ID",
      ylab = "Salary per Month",
      main="Salary in relation to Department")
```
